Let's Find a Simpler, Less Troubled Cosmology

The Cult of the Big Bang: Was There a Bang?
William C Mitchell
(p182)

"[I]t's not suggested here that we stop striving for answers to our questions.  What is suggested is that we do so with open minds, ignoring the influence of the general acceptance of [Big Bang Theory] and, based on what we know and what we don't know, see if we can't discover a simpler less troubled cosmology, and, in the meantime, live with our questions about origins."
